_comment: E-T Systems Module Manifest v2.  Copy this file to your project root as et_module.json and fill in your values.  Remove all _comment and _schema fields before shipping.
description: What your module does in one sentence.
_install_path_comment: Populated at install time by install.sh/deploy.sh.  Leave blank here.
_service_name_comment: systemd service name if module runs as a daemon.  Empty if not a service.
_api_port_comment: HTTP port if module exposes an API.  0 if none.

ecosystem._comment: Declares this module's participation in the E-T Systems ecosystem.
ecosystem._ng_lite_comment: true if this module vendors ng_lite.py.  Required for Tier 1.
ecosystem._ng_lite_version_comment: Version of ng_lite.py vendored.  Must match canonical source in NeuroGraph repo.
ecosystem._peer_bridge_comment: true if this module vendors ng_peer_bridge.py and connects NGPeerBridge on startup.  Required for Tier 2.
ecosystem._tier3_upgrade_comment: true if this module uses ng_ecosystem.py and will auto-upgrade to NGSaaSBridge when NeuroGraph is detected.  Required for Tier 3.
ecosystem._ng_ecosystem_version_comment: Version of ng_ecosystem.py vendored.  Must match canonical source in NeuroGraph repo.
ecosystem._openclaw_adapter_comment: Filename of the OpenClaw hook if this module exposes one (e.g. 'trollguard_hook.py').  Empty if not an OpenClaw skill.
ecosystem._openclaw_skill_name_comment: Display name used in OpenClaw skill telemetry.  Empty if not an OpenClaw skill.
ecosystem._shared_learning_writes_comment: true if this module writes to ~/.et_modules/shared_learning/.  Should match peer_bridge.
ecosystem._capabilities_comment: Free-form list of module capability tags.  Used by ETModuleManager for feature discovery.  Examples: 'security', 'routing', 'memory', 'snn-backend'.

_dependencies_comment: List of other module_ids this module requires to be installed.  Empty for most modules.
_provides_comment: List of module_ids this module can serve as a backend for.  NeuroGraph uses ['*'] meaning it can upgrade any peer module to Tier 3.
